研究将遗传学连接到戒烟的成功与Varenicline的成功根据莱斯特大学（英国）的一项研究，普通药物戒烟的有效性可能取决于人们的基因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250218/study-links-genetics-to-success-success-smoking-cessation-cessation-with-varenicline.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250218/study-links-genetics-to-success-success-smoking-cessation-cessation-with-varenicline.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c8c444d-4506-4739-4739-8969-91131016382a Tue, 18 Feb 2025 09:00:54 -0500 Study links genetics to success of smoking cessation with varenicline
阿斯顿大学合作开发可注射糊的骨癌治疗阿斯顿大学（Aston University）正在研究研究可以治疗骨癌的可注射糊状物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250218/aston-university-collaborates-onightable-paste-paste-for-for-bone-bone-cancer-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250218/aston-university-collaborates-on indentable-paste-paste-for-bone-bone-bone-cancer-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id= e72871f5-613d-4746-bd63-d937E2E0A6D6 Tue, 18 Feb 2025 08:55:26 -0500 Aston University collaborates on injectable paste for bone cancer treatment
研究表明，ctDNA测试可以彻底改变乳腺癌治疗多年来，乳腺癌的治疗一直受到肿瘤组织中发现的遗传改变的指导，通常是通过侵入性活检。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250218/study-shows-ctdna-testing-could-revolution-could-revolutionize-breast-cancer-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250218/study-shows-ctdna-testing-could-revolutions-could-revolutions-breast-cancer-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=75940bf5-48eb-4582-B785-A0E1E719E10B Tue, 18 Feb 2025 08:52:23 -0500 Study shows ctDNA testing could revolutionize breast cancer treatment
在湖中游泳可能会增加军团菌感染的风险CMAJ发表在CMAJ上的一篇练习文章的作者说，在一些静水湖中游泳会导致军团菌，可能引起肺炎的细菌以及从事开放水游泳的人的感染。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250218/swimming-in-lakes-may-increase-may-increase-risk-crease-crisk-of-legionella-infection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250218/swimming-in-lakes-may-increase-may-increase-risk-os-of-of-legionella-infection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=15AA252B-8056-423E-97B5-DD8802FFABF5 Tue, 18 Feb 2025 08:23:46 -0500 Swimming in lakes may increase risk of Legionella infection

加强肠道障碍可能会阻止克罗恩病的进展瑞典哥德堡大学的研究人员发现了一种关键机制，这可能为克罗恩病创新治疗铺平道路。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250218/strengthing-the-gut-barrier-barrier-may-halt-crohne28099s-disease-progression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250218/strengthen-the-the-gut-barrier-may-halt-crohne28099s-disease-progression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=867ebeee-9623-492C-8734-818F5AE12AB1 Tue, 18 Feb 2025 08:08:00 -0500 Strengthening the gut barrier may halt Crohn’s disease progression

止痛诊所从“不必要的”注射中赚了数百万美元每个月，米歇尔·肖（Michelle Shaw）去了一个痛苦的诊所，以使她的背部更糟 - 这样她就可以得到使她的后背感觉更好的药。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250218/pain-cain-clinics-made-made-made-made-from-e28098unnnnnnnnessarye28099 indections-into-e28098098human-pin-pin-cushionse28099.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250218/pain-clinics-made-made-millions-from-e28098unnnnnnnneclessarye28099 indections-into-e28098098human-pin-pin-cushionse28099.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8B279B98-9B32-4E77-B65E-51817A5BBB4EF Tue, 18 Feb 2025 06:03:12 -0500 Pain clinics made millions from ‘unnecessary’ injections into ‘human pin cushions’

基因疗法的突破为严重的Dravet综合征病例提供了希望AAV-NAVβ1基因治疗可有效地减少癫痫发作并延长SCN1B连接Dravet综合征的小鼠模型，从而为将来的治疗铺平道路。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250218/gene-therapy-therapy-breakthrough-offers-hope-for-severe-severe-dravet-syndrome-cases.aspx.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250218/gene-therapy-breakthrough-offers-hope-for-for-severe-dravet-syndrome-cases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=61f2C8AA-7F00-4B48-974B-CDE612B4EF3C Tue, 18 Feb 2025 05:03:00 -0500 Gene therapy breakthrough offers hope for severe Dravet syndrome cases
